items.name: Aluminium Ore
items.description: Aluminium Ore is a mid-game Mineral Resource. Prospectors can first utilize aluminium once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3 , when it can be crafted into upgraded Weaponslike the Recurve Bowand Aluminium Arrow. It is widely used in constructs (for example,Aluminium Beamand Aluminium Door), and in the late-game it is a vital component of Itemslike Composite Chest Armor.

items.name: Arctic Explorer Saddle
items.description: The Arctic Explorer Saddle is a saddle for Mountsthat has an artic theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Art Deco Candlestick
items.description: The Art Deco Candlestick is an gilded item of significant worth. It can be built with either beeswax or animal fat and takes either as fuel inputs.

items.name: Bearhide Saddle
items.description: The Bearhide Saddle is a saddle for Mountsthat has a bear theme. It is available as part of the Creature Comforts DLCand is a cosmetic change to the Basic Riding Saddlethat provides no additional attributes.

items.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked in Tier 2 of the Tech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlier Woodversions with the inclusion of Beeswax

items.name: Beeswax Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Reinforced wood building pieces can be unlocked in Tier 2 of the Tech Tree. These building pieces are more resistant to damage than their earlier Woodversions with the inclusion of Beeswax

items.name: Biomore Backpack
items.description: The Biomore Backpack provides six inventory slots, along with 3 active auras where the prospector and nearby allies having increased physical resistance, quicker healing from bacterial, parasitic and poison modifiers, and additional health regeneration. It also has offers buffs for the wearer, reducing the stamina impact from using tools, and providing more health to downed prospectors when revived. An excellent choice for prospectors specializing in rescues.

items.name: Bone
items.description: Bone is a Animal Resourceobtained from Fauna. It is also sometimes found when harvesting fish.

items.name: Bone Javelin
items.description: The Bone Javelin is a variant of the Bone Spearthat can only be thrown and is an upgrade to the Wood Javelin. Despite it requiring more materials to craft, the increase in damage can mean the difference between winning and losing a fight against Icarus' fauna.

items.name: Bone Lure
items.description: The Bone Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rodor a Basic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures, the Bone Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Bone Shield
items.description: The Bone Shield is crafted at the Character Crafting menu with the following resources:

items.name: Bone Sickle
items.description: Used by 'attacking' plants such as shrubs,Reed Flower,Wheat, etc. Sickles significantly increase the yield of plants when harvesting.

items.name: Brutalist Candlestick
items.description: The Brutalist Candlestick is mode from concrete and either animal fat or beeswax. There are two varieties by selecting R. Fuel is either beeswax or animal fat.

items.name: Carbon Fiber
items.description: While being a Tier 3 component, Carbon Fiber is only used to make Carbon Arrows, the Carbon Spear/Javelin, and the Carbon Fibre Round Shieldin the Tier 3  Tech Tree; however, it is a critical component widely used in Tier 4 crafting.

items.name: Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch
items.description: The Carved Wood 2-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch
items.description: The Carved Wood 3-Seater Couch is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Bookshelf
items.description: The Carved Wood Bookshelf is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Cabinet
items.description: The Carved Wood Cabinet is a decorative piece with 10 item slots.

items.name: Carved Wood Candlestick
items.description: The Carved Wood Candlestick can be crafted using either beeswax or animal fat and will take either as fuel. There are three varieties that can be selected using the 'R' key while deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Desk Lamp
items.description: The Carved Wood Desk Lamp is a decorative item that requires 150 kwh of electricity

items.name: Carved Wood Dresser
items.description: The Carved Wood Dresser is a decorative item with 10 inventory slots.

items.name: Carved Wood Nightstand
items.description: The Carved Wood Nightstand is a decorative nightstand with 10 inventory slots. It has five build variants available by using the 'R' key when deploying.

items.name: Carved Wood Stool
items.description: The Carved Wood Stool is a decorative item.

items.name: Carved Wood Wardrobe
items.description: The Carved Wood Wardrobe is a decorative wardrobe with 10 inventory slots. It has two build variants available by selecting 'R' when deploying.

items.name: Coal Ore
items.description: Coal Ore is a Mineralfound on Icarus in the open and caves. It's most basic use is as a fuel in a Campfireor Stone Furnace, though this is somewhat inefficient as it is more valuable as component for crafting.

items.name: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone
items.description: Coffee Smoked Fatty T-bone is a Foodwith a unique Status Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger.

items.name: Copper Ore
items.description: Copper Ore is an early-game Mineral Resource. It is widely used in the construction of Interior Wood Building Pieces, and prospectors can make extensive use of copper once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3 , as it is a crucial component in Electronics. In the late game, copper is used in various deployables like the Refrigeratorand the Material Processor.

items.name: Crushed Bone
items.description: Useful alternate resource for making Epoxy.

items.name: Dried Fatty T-Bone
items.description: Dried Fatty T-Bone is a Foodwith a unique Status Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfy Hunger.

items.name: Fiber
items.description: In-game description:A bundle of soft fiber, highly useful.

items.name: Fiber Farming Packet
items.description: The Fiber Farming Packet is unlocked in the Workshopon the Space Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Fiber seeds, which then can be planted in Dirt Moundsor Crop plots to grow Plant Resources.

items.name: Fiber Lure
items.description: The Fiber Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rodor a Basic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures, the Fiber Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Frozen Ore
items.description: Frozen Ore is a resource produced as a by-product of mining a mineral node with a Pickaxethat has a chance to produce frozen ore, such as the Cold Steel Pickaxeor Inaris "Viridian" Pickaxe.

items.name: Gold Ore
items.description: Gold Ore is a Mineral Resource. Prospectors can make extensive use of Gold Ore once they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3 , as it is a crucial component in Electronics.

items.name: Gold Ore Lure
items.description: The Gold Ore Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rodor a Basic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like all Lures, the Gold Ore Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Ice Borer
items.description: The Ice Borer will drill super-cooled ice deposits when supplied with biofuel from a Biofuel Can/MXC Fuel Canister. Super-cooled ice deposits can only be found on frozen lakes and rivers in the Arctic regions of Prometheus (Biomes: Glacial Cascade or Alpine Steppe - a map of Prometheus biomes can be foundhere.). The Ice Borer has 5 slots and will last 2 hours and 5 minutes on a full Biofuel Can.

items.name: Industrial Candlestick
items.description: The Industrial Candlestick is a decorative item from the Industrial Furniture Pack DLC.

items.name: Interior Wood Cupboard
items.description: A Interior Wood Cupboard made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to the Wood Cupboard.

items.name: Interior Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Ladder
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Railing
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer.

items.name: Interior Wood Railing Gate
items.description: Interior Wood Building Pieces bring a clean appealing aesthetic to any base, although usually rather weak to weather, and quite flammable. Can be repaired with a Repair Hammer.

items.name: Iron Ore
items.description: Iron Ore is a Mineral, that allows prospectors to create Tier 2 /Tier 3 Toolsand Weaponswith both the Anvil Benchand Machining Bench. In addition, iron is widely used in Steel Ingotfor crafting Itemssuch as the Steel Pickaxe, and Late-game Deployables like the Fabricator/Electric Furnace.

items.name: Medium Interior Wood Crate
items.description: A Medium Interior Wood Crate made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to the Medium Wood Crate.

items.name: Medium Wood Crate
items.description: Larger than the Small Wood Crate, the Medium Wood Crate also possesses an increased inventory space with 20 slots. Like most other Deployables, this must be under Shelteror it will be destroyed when exposed to Weatherevents. It is possible to loot the contents if this crate is destroyed, but only for a limited time.

items.name: Medium Wood Hedgehog
items.description: The Medium Wood Hedgehog are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment.

items.name: NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade
items.description: The NOREX Boss Tracker Upgrade is an upgrade for the CONT4CT Devicedeployed in an Open Worldmap that visually upgrades the screens and provides a Bosses tab that provides information on the currently active world bosses.

items.name: Platinum Ore
items.description: Platinum Ore is a mid-game Mineral Resource, and can be utilized by prospectors after they reach level 20 and unlock Tier 3 in the Tech Tree. Platinum is required for a number of upgraded Toolsand Weapons, including the Platinum Spearand Platinum Sickle.

items.name: Silica Ore
items.description: Silica Ore is a Mineralfound on the surface of Icarus. Prospectors are likely to first use silica to create the Mortar and Pestle. However, it is also the key in making glass and concrete.

items.name: Small Interior Wood Crate
items.description: A Small Interior Wood Crate made of refined wood and copper nails. Similar size to the Small Wood Crate.

items.name: Small Stone Sign
items.description: The Small Stone Sign is a deployable sign post available as a wall sign, floor sign or a small angled variant.

items.name: Small Wood Crate
items.description: The Small Wood Crate is the first available storage container that can be made by the prospector. While limited in inventory space, anything here will not be lost upon the death of the prospector or count against inventory weight. Like most other Deployables, this must be under Shelteror it will be destroyed when exposed to Weatherevents. It is possible to loot the contents if this crate is destroyed, but only for a limited time.

items.name: Small Wood Sign
items.description: A Small Wood Sign made of Refined Woodand Copper Nails.

items.name: Stick
items.description: Sticks are harvested by picking them up off of the ground, or when harvesting small trees and saplings. Sticks can also be crafted from wood at the Carpentry Bench, or in the Character Craftingmenu if you have the Wood Breakdowntalent (and its matching Blueprint in Tier 1 ).

items.name: Stone
items.description: Stone is one of the most abundant Mineralsavailable on Icarus. Prospectors will make extensive use of stone from the moment they exit their drop-pods, as it is widely used in the early game for both Toolsand Weapons.

items.name: Stone Brick
items.description: Stone Bricks are a refined resource primarily used to craft Stone Brick Building Piecesat an Advanced Masonry Bench/Electric Masonry Bench.

items.name: Stone Brick Halfpieces
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Brick Halfpitches
items.description: Stone Brick pieces offer +10 Insulation from Temperature, +100% Falling Tree Resistance and +65% Wind Resistance.

items.name: Stone Buffalo Statue
items.description: The Stone Buffalo Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Cairn
items.description: Stone Cairns are a deployable item can be used as waystones to mark a path across the landscape or to mark areas of significance. Stone Cairns also have one inventory slot that can be used to store deceased pets, marking their grave and providing them a small memorial. When inspecting the Stone Cairn by pressing F, the name and description can be changed as needed.

items.name: Stone Caveworm Statue
items.description: The Stone Caveworm Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Deer Statue
items.description: The Stone Deer Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Elephant Statue
items.description: The Stone Elephant Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Frame
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Halfpieces
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Halfpitches
items.description: Stronger than Wood, and resistant to weather, Stone Buildings are a game changer when it comes to surviving on Icarus.

items.name: Stone Komodo Statue
items.description: The Stone Komodo Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Pile
items.description: The Stone Pile, alongside the Wood Pile, are makeshift storage options for large quantities of each raw material. The Stone Pile is immune to ALLWeatherdamage and can be used as a durable barrier to Fauna, especially against Fauna like the Grizzly Bear. If placed with just a narrow opening between piles, Bears have an incredibly difficult time getting through which allows the Prospector to melee attack just beyond the bear's attack range.

items.name: Stone Piranha Statue
items.description: The Stone Piranha Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Rabbit Statue
items.description: The Stone Rabbit Statue is a decorative stone item.

items.name: Stone Water Trough
items.description: The Stone Water Trough is a decorative upgrade to the Water Troughthat allows multiple creatures to drink from it simultaneously and can be connected to Waterusing a Water Pipe Tool, similar to the Large Water Trough. The Stone Water Trough can only store water and cannot provide water to the rest of the network like Water Barrelsor Metal Rain Reservoirs.

items.name: Stonejaw Trophy
items.description: Stonejaw Trophies are decorative deployables that can be placed on any wall surface and are used to liven any living space. Aside from helping prospectors complete the Bestiary, it can also be used in tandem with other Furnitureto increase the Cozinessof your living quarters, increasing the duration and effectiveness of the Well Rested Buff.

items.name: Titanium Ore
items.description: Titanium Ore is a late-game Mineral, and can be utilized by prospectors after they reach level 30 and unlock the Fabricatorin the Tier 4 Tech Tree. Titanium represents the current pinnacle of material strength for Toolsand for several Weapons.

items.name: Water Borer
items.description: The Water Borer is a device that can be placed on Enzyme Geysersand when powered, can be used to extract Waterwhich can be fed into a water network.

items.name: Wood
items.description: Wood is a basic crafting ingredient obtained from Trees using an axe or harvested by hand in the Desertvia Cacti. Wood can also be used as a Fuel source for Campfire,Fireplace, and Stone Furnace.

items.name: Wood Buffalo Statue
items.description: The Wood Buffalo Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Burner
items.description: The Wood Burner is a source of heat and basic cooking similar to a Campfireor Fireplace. It provides the Warming Fire effect (heat and +100% Perceived Threat) allowing a Prospector to sleep nearby. Once fuel is added, it can be activated and will consume fuel regardless of any selected recipe.

items.name: Wood Composter
items.description: Wood Composter increases the rate at which food spoils, and will turn Spoiled Plantsor Guanointo Basic Fertilizer.

items.name: Wood Crop Plot
items.description: The Wood Crop Plot is a farming plot for growing Seedsthat can later be harvested for Plant Resourcesonce fully grown. Unless the Prospector has the Fresh Is Besttalent when deploying a seed into the crop plot, the grown Plant Resourcewill eventually wither if not harvested.

items.name: Wood Cupboard
items.description: Taking up the same floor-space but with a much larger inventory, this is a great upgrade from the Medium Wood Crate.

items.name: Wood Deer Statue
items.description: The Wood Deer Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Gate Fortification
items.description: The Wood Gate Fortification serves as an entrance when using Wood Wall Fortifications. Similar to Medium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Gate Fortification does not take damage during storms.Wood Spikes Fortificationcannot be mounted to the Wood Gate Fortification.

items.name: Wood Halfpieces
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection to Deployablesand Storagecontainers. Wood roofs or walls require a floor or wall structure such as Wood Wallfor snapping. Hold 'R' while placing the Wood Halfpieces itself to determine shape as well as placement as roof, or wall.

items.name: Wood Halfpitches
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection to Deployablesand Storagecontainers. Wood roofs or walls require a floor or wall structure such as Wood Wallfor snapping. Hold 'R' while placing the Wood Halfpitches itself to determine shape as well as placement as roof, or wall.

items.name: Wood Javelin
items.description: The Wood Javelin is a variant of the Wood Spearthat can only be thrown. The Wood Javelin has the slowest projectile travel time and highest projectile fall-off, but that can be overlooked by it's cheap producibility.

items.name: Wood Ladder
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offer good protection to Deployablesand Storagecontainers. Wood Ladders can be use with Trapdoor holes (hold R while holding a floor building piece and select the Trapdoor variant from the radial wheel). Does not snap to trapdoor holes.

items.name: Wood Pile
items.description: The Wood Pile, alongside the Stone Pile, are makeshift storage options for large quantities of each raw material. Though immune to most Weatherdamage, beware of lightning strikes. Can be used as a durable barrier to Fauna, especially against Fauna like the Grizzly Bear, although the stone variant is preferred.

items.name: Wood Piranha Statue
items.description: The Wood Piranha Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Rabbit Statue
items.description: The Wood Rabbit Statue is a decorative wood item.

items.name: Wood Railing
items.description: The Wood Railing is part of the Wood Building Trim Set, which is learned in the Tier 1 Tech Tree after unlocking the Wood Building Base Set.

items.name: Wood Railing Gate
items.description: Stronger than Thatch, wood buildings are a good starting point for Prospectors wanting to establish a 'Main Base'. While still flammable, they are able to fully withstand most light storms and offers good protection to Deployablesand Storagecontainers. Wood Railing Gates can be deployed on their own or can be snapped to railings/floors.

items.name: Wood Shield
items.description: The Wood Shield is crafted at the Anvil, Forge, or Foundry with the following resources:

items.name: Wood Spikes Fortification
items.description: The Wood Spikes Fortification serves as large hedgehog that can attach Wood Wall Fortificationsto fend off the predators of Icarus. Similar to Medium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Spikes Fortification does not take damage during storms.

items.name: Wood Walkway Fortification
items.description: The Wood Walkway Fortification is attached to Wood Wall Fortificationsand serves as a platform that Prospectors can stand on, providing them a vantage point to see over their walls. Similar to Medium Wood Hedgehogs, the Wood Walkway Fortification does not take damage during storms.

items.name: Wooden Lure
items.description: The Wooden Lure can be attached to a Fishing Rodor a Basic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. Like all Lures, the Wooden Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Wooden Shovel
items.description: The Wooden Shovel is an early-game Toolused to create Dirt Mounds(right-click), harvest Ice/Dirt/Sand(left-click), or remove ash/snow buildup on structures in the Arctic/Volcanicbiomes on Icarus.
